text: Buchireddypalem is a town in the Nellore district of Andhra Pradesh, India. It is 15 km from Nellore city. It is on the state highway between Nellore and Mumbai. The closest railway station is Nellore railway station. The closest seaport is Krishnapatnam. The closest airports are Tirupati Airport in Tirupati and Chennai Airport in Chennai. Category:Towns in Andhra Pradesh
title: Buchireddypalem
